# Pull Request

NOTE: Please ensure you have an issue that has been acknowledged by a core contributor and routed you to open a pull request against this repository. Otherwise, please open an issue before continuing with this pull request.

## Category-Specific Templates

For PRs in these categories, use the appropriate template by appending `?template=<name>.md` to the PR URL:

| Category | Template | When to Use |
|----------|----------|-------------|
| Components | `?template=component.md` | Adding/modifying components in `mellea/stdlib/components/` |
| Requirements | `?template=requirement.md` | Adding/modifying requirements in `mellea/stdlib/requirements/` |
| Sampling Strategies | `?template=sampling.md` | Adding/modifying strategies in `mellea/stdlib/sampling/` |
| Tools | `?template=tool.md` | Adding/modifying formatters in `mellea/formatters` |

---

## Description
- [ ] Link to Issue: 

<!-- Brief description of the changes -->

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring
- [ ] Other (please describe)

## Checklist
- [ ] New code has 100% coverage
- [ ] Tests added/updated as needed
- [ ] Ensure existing tests and github automation passes
- [ ] Documentation updated as needed
